WaveNight.Night_Start_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="314d6d9b98ab4041a32d61ac9de65e36" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]¡Cuidado con las criaturas nocturnas!
WaveNight.Night_Start_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="f3eddca82a614b5db7471e724a71080e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Vas a necesitar más Pikmin luminosos...
WaveNight.Night_Start_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="36c3635912e54ed4a53a737051b5c576" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]¡Protege esa lumiloma! Je, je, je.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="1c72050f0b2f48159a34926701fdba5c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]¡Reúne muchos Pikmin luminosos!
Te será más fácil proteger la lumiloma.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="1ea9bcb13de7426ab841038ee72330e4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Las bestias furiosas atacan las lumilomas.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c080130754ad4307a6cd9499777ff4d9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]¡Ataca con las [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]cargas cegadoras[System:Color name="Default"]!
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_03: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="adda7d97d11b4cd08f29513fbbc88186" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Usa señuelomas... como [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]señuelo[System:Color name="Default"], je, je, je...
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_04: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="d9087fd455cd408699a398a8da00d89b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Localiza [System:Color name="Default"]lumilomas con el [Grammar:Decap/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Radar nocturno[System:Color name="Default"].
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="eb49fe3b1be24cb9986d6ef50661005c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Vigila criaturas enfurecidas con el radar.
Aparecen [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]señaladas en rojo[System:Color name="Default"].
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_06: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal03"/][UE:Meta key="26e4e00b015c4175bee4876f402bd901" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]¡Aprovecha los [Grammar:Decap/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Objetos[System:Color name="Default"] de tu inventario!
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_07: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="64aa79119f0945e492c99da95574b1ae" Scale="0.9953161"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]¡Que [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Ochin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] te ayude a proteger la lumiloma!
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="6c7ce8ffe6194868bf744f45899a7ad2" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Usa las [System:Color name="Emphasis" ]semillas luminosas[System:Color name="Default"].
Podrás incrementar tus Pikmin luminosos.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_09: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="25f223e511e5475bb0a9dc7ed1970b75" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Intenta alternar para dividir tareas.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="70338dde45e545e3b2e16baf384f1415" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Command"/][System:Color name="Emphasis" ]Envía a tu acompañante a la lumiloma.[System:Color name="Default"]
Puedes hacerlo con la acción "Petición".
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_11: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="51e2f00fe7cb4c2d9ebc46a018a7442d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Si hay 2 lumilomas, divide el trabajo.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_12:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="2079dc98dabb4f0da05285e72c899bf3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Vence enemigos antes de que enfurezcan.
Muy buena estrategia, je, je, je.
WaveNight.Night_ReStart_13:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="4b268fd0633341adacf2c88de879df36" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]No te abrumes si pierdes Pikmin luminosos.
[Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Vuelven a las lumilomas en forma de luz.
WaveNight.Night_HalfTimeHPLow_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="0e5684c9edd04326ac5dc1f5b98c7c3b" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Aguanta; ¡la noche siempre llega a su fin!
WaveNight.Night_HalfTimeHPHi_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="5416b0302fbc49cd925d89ce42ef0e0f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]¡Aún no se termina esto!
WaveNight.Night_HalfTimeHPHi_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c4e6b9ef56004505a3e08ab0a673907d" Scale="0.9189189"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Quieres que amanezca ya, ¿verdad? Je, je, je...
WaveNight.Night_HintEnliven_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal01"/][UE:Meta key="53ac734631bf42bd83adb8f5a02fcd66" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]¡No pierdas de vista la lumiloma!
WaveNight.Night_HintEnliven_01:

WaveNight.Night_HintEnliven_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="c882faab539b4a13bf565cf0f52dcb93" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Pikmin luminosos... ¿Tienes suficientes?
WaveNight.Night_Enliven_00: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="a8612a770fa8474aacb3eec0c8a70958" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]¡Protege la lumiloma a toda costa!
WaveNight.Night_Enliven_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal02"/][UE:Meta key="b580a64b7a7a44aaa9ae3a3c178aee83" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]¡[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Ochin[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] te ayudará con la defensa!
WaveNight.Night_Enliven_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal10"/][UE:Meta key="d259e4c2d0b34dd0b54c088bf665e626" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]Reúne suficientes Pikmin luminosos...
